hero.title: Safety & Trust
hero.description: ManzelHelp is a platform that connects customers with taskers. We provide tools and features to help you make informed decisions, but all users and taskers are fully responsible for their interactions and transactions.

platformDisclaimer.title: Important Platform Disclaimer
platformDisclaimer.description: ManzelHelp is a technology platform that facilitates connections between customers and taskers. We do not provide insurance, protection, or guarantee services.
points: ManzelHelp is a platform only - we connect users, we do not provide services
Users and taskers are fully responsible for their interactions
We do not provide insurance or protection coverage
All transactions are between users and taskers directly
Users should verify taskers and taskers should verify customers before engaging
Any disputes must be resolved directly between the parties involved

forCustomers.title: For Customers
tips: Always communicate through our platform before meeting
Verify tasker identity and read reviews carefully
Meet in public places for initial consultations when possible
Keep valuable items secure during service
Report any concerns through our platform immediately
Ensure you have proper insurance coverage for your property if needed

forTaskers.title: For Taskers
tips: Verify customer identity and service requirements
Meet in public places for initial consultations when possible
Inform someone about your work schedule and location
Trust your instincts - if something feels wrong, do not proceed
Document your work with photos when appropriate
Ensure you have proper insurance coverage for your work if needed

legalDisclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer
legalDisclaimer.description: Important information about platform liability and user responsibility
legalDisclaimer.content: ManzelHelp is a technology platform that facilitates connections between customers seeking services and taskers providing services. ManzelHelp does not provide, guarantee, or insure any services. All services are provided directly by taskers to customers. Users and taskers are solely responsible for their interactions, transactions, and any disputes that may arise. ManzelHelp is not liable for any damages, losses, or injuries that may occur as a result of using the platform. Users are advised to obtain appropriate insurance coverage and to comply with all applicable Moroccan laws and regulations.
